modName: Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP
descriptionHtml:
Hot Mods (Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit) by andymanz67
[youtube]2U3dhuI9Xjk[/youtube]

Description
===========
This mod adds sorceress outfits.

How to use:
The costumes are craftable at any forge.

Ingredients:

Sorceress Outfit
-Iron ingot	1
-Leather strips	3
-Linen wrap	3

Sorceress Hat
-Leather strips	1
-Linen wrap	1

Sorceress Shoes
-Iron ingot 1
-Leather strips 1

Separated items:

Sorceress Corset
-Iron ingot	1
-Leather strips	1
-Linen wrap	1

Sorceress Skirt
-Leather strips	1
-Linen wrap	1

Sorceress Thong
-Leather strips	1
-Linen wrap	1

or

Open the console, then please type additem code, OR \"help sorceress 0\".
player.additem XX001011 1

ItemIDs:
Sorceress Outfit	XX000D65
Sorceress Hat		XX000D66
Sorceress Shoes XX001831
Sorceress Corset	XX001D9C
Sorceress Skirt		XX001D9A
Sorceress Thong		XX001D9B

XX is DCSorceress.esp\'s load order.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Changelog
=========


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
-There\'s no specific world/inventory models.
-Some pretty clipping problem.

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to dimon99 for creating UNP.
Thanks to SkyrimNexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don\'t complain to me if it
doesn\'t work or your PC blows up.
author: Backsteppo
